seller_comments: Additional Manufacture Options: -19 AMG Cross Spoke Forged Wheels -Perforated Nappa Leather pkg -Premium 1 pkg -Premium 2 pkg -AMG Performance Exhaust pkg -Heated & Ventilated Front Seats pkg This 2017 Mercedes-Benz C-Class C 63 AMG is a head-turner in sleek Selenite Gray Metallic, embodying power and luxury in one striking package. With rear-wheel drive and a 7-speed automatic transmission, it's powered by the exhilarating AMG 4.0L Biturbo V8, delivering an unforgettable performance. The 152-point safety inspection ensures youre driving a meticulously vetted vehicle, and the experience inside is equally impressive. An 8.4 high-resolution screen and COMAND with Navigation and Voice Control keep you effortlessly connected, while the Burmester Surround Sound System fills the cabin with concert-quality audio. The Premium 1 and 2 packages bring an array of luxurious touches, including heated and ventilated front seats in Nappa leather and advanced ambient lighting to set the perfect mood. The AIRCAP system, AMG Performance Exhaust, and 19 AMG cross-spoke forged wheels further enhance the driving experience, giving you the thrill and sophistication synonymous with the AMG brand. Price does not include Dealer Added Accessories. Some vehicles may have added markup. Freight cost not included. Call dealer for details. Reviews: * The interior is impeccably crafted; there are plenty of available cutting-edge features; exterior styling turns heads everywhere. Source: Edmunds

seller_comments: *** CLEAN TITLE ***   This 2013 Mercedes-Benz ML 350 4MATIC is a luxurious SUV that's powered by a 3.5L V6 engine producing 302 horsepower and 273ft. lbs of torque. With less than 80,000 miles, this vehicle has been gently driven and has an average mileage of less than 7,000 miles per year.   The factory default features on this vehicle are impressive. It comes equipped with a power liftgate, heated power-adjustable mirrors, rain-sensing wipers, a sunroof, and a rearview camera. The interior is equally impressive, with leather upholstery, heated front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, and a power-adjustable steering wheel.   The entertainment system is also top-notch, with a 7-inch display, Bluetooth connectivity, and a premium sound system. Safety features include antilock brakes, stability control, and a comprehensive set of airbags.   Overall, this 2013 Mercedes-Benz ML 350 4MATIC is in excellent condition and comes with a wide range of features that make it a great choice for buyers looking for a reliable, luxurious SUVAll prices plus government fees and taxes, any finance charges, any dealer document processing charges ($85), any electronic filing charge, and any emission testing charge. The plush seats provide ultimate comfort, while the 8-way driver and passenger seats allow you to find your perfect position.
